title: Bug 102623 - Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After following the steps provided, the imported image named 'image1.jpg' is not refreshed and stays the same in the layout view.
EB: The imported image 'image1.jpg' should be refreshed and display the updated content after renaming 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
SR:
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view. 
2. Delete this image file from the outline image. 
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'. 
4. Observe the layout view and verify if the imported image is refreshed and displaying the updated content.
